name: Time to dig out that ugly Christmas jumper
name_original: Time to dig out that ugly Christmas jumper
description:
It comes to a time of year when your shorts sink down your drawer and huge jumpers with amazing patterns, start to emerge from the dark dusty depths of your wardrobe. Of course in Shetland a ganzie is not just for Christmas! (NB: Ganzie = sweater/jersey in Shetland Dialect).

My first bitsy game!

Instructions
Knit (navigate) the jumper (maze) using the knitting needles (arrow keys).
